content: this trio of linen stitch bracelets is the perfect way to use the remainders of your most beautiful yarns--little works of art for your wrist ______ this pattern and items made from it are for personal use only while i cannot stop anyone from doing so if you feel somehow entitled to personally profit from selling items made using my designs 1 acknowledge me as the designer 2 knit the item **properly** no one likes sloppy seconds 3 make a donation from each sale yes every single one to your local food bank knitting instructors/teachers may use this pattern to teach a class without asking permission first but 1 do not charge your students for using this pattern do not bundled the pattern with yarn and buttons 2 have your students print the pattern out themselves 3 linen stitch is meant to be knit tightly--this is not the best project for new or beginner knitters charity sales are permitted but my version of chairty does not include personal charity thanks catw
